txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! You assisted in defeating Núrzum, but the enemy has not given up. They still roam our lands and lurk in the shadows.\n\n'The Uruk captain, Varg, is a brutal leader of the White Hand forces in Balewood and must be defeated. Go there, and show them that Wildermore will endure!'
You have defeated Varg and his warband, and secured a more peaceful future for the denizens of Balewood.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum has been defeated, but the enemy persists throughout much of Wildermore. The Uruk captain, Varg, is a brutal leader of the White Hand forces in Balewood and must be defeated.
Varg can be found roaming near the Orc roadway in northern Balewood.\n\nThe Uruk leader, Varg, must be defeated before he can sow more havoc in Balewood.
You have defeated Varg and his warband.
